executiveSummary: Ashley Sharma and James Baker from Oakland, California, pitched their company Cincha Travel, seeking $200,000 for 15% equity on Shark Tank. They showcased their stylish and functional travel belt designed to secure personal bags to carry-on luggage. After receiving multiple declines, Barbara Corcoran offered $200,000 for 25% equity with a $4-per-unit royalty until repayment, which the founders accepted.
keyDecisions: Barbara Corcoran invested $200,000 for 25% equity in Cincha Travel, including a $4-per-unit royalty until the investment is recouped, then reduced to $0.50 per unit.

actionItems.task: Expand Cincha Travel’s retail presence, including airport stores as planned
Implement partnership and growth strategy with Barbara Corcoran’s guidance

nextSteps: Ashley Sharma and James Baker will collaborate with Barbara Corcoran to scale Cincha Travel, optimize customer acquisition costs, and enter retail and airport store channels.
